remarks:
Membership in a Cartesian product.  This version requires no quantifiers or dummy variables.  See also ~ elxp5 , ~ elxp6 , and ~ elxp7 . (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2004.) 

---

 Membership in a cross product.  This version requires no quantifiers or dummy variables.  See also ~ elxp5 .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2004.)
statement: elxp4 $p |- ( A e. ( B X. C ) <-> ( A = <. U. dom { A } , U. ran { A } >. /\ ( U. dom { A } e. B /\ U. ran { A } e. C ) ) ) $.
